column2: seaweed salad and spicy tofu are good. Ramen is so so
column3: I ordered the famous spicy chicken ramen
column4: 2 pieces of chicken katsu seem to be thoroughly cooked
column5: but they still have a strong taste of raw meat
column6: which I personally cannot accept. As for the portion
column7: it's not as large or generous as some other people say. It's just regular size compared to other ramen I have had in other cities in US. I also think it will be better if some more soup can be added.
